title: About us
sectionDescription:
Aelan Place is owned and operated by a family originally from Sydney, Australia. The owners have lived in Espiritu Santo for three generations.

The name "Aelan" means "island" in bislama, which is the language of Vanuatu. The apartments itself are located just ten minutes away from Pekoa International Airport and is conveniently located along the main street, it is also situated right next to a local supermarket.
